alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Clark; Madison; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 7:09PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EASTERN CHAMPAIGN AND EASTERN CLARK COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO, MADISON AND SOUTHWESTERN UNION COUNTIES IN CENTRAL OHIO THROUGH 800 PM EDT... At 708 PM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of North Lewisburg to near Jeffersonville, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Marysville, London, West Jefferson, Mount Sterling, Mechanicsburg, North Lewisburg, Choctaw Lake, Brighton, Milford Center, Lafayette, South Vienna, Midway, Woodstock, Catawba, Unionville Center, Mutual, Newport, Cable, Chenoweth and Rosedale. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 66 and 82. I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 76 and 86. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central and west central Ohio. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
